name: Industry Adaptation
description: Tests the model's ability to adapt presentation content to specific industries and sectors

prompts.text: Create a presentation about data security that is specifically adapted for the healthcare industry. The presentation should address HIPAA compliance, patient data protection, healthcare-specific security threats, and industry best practices. Use relevant healthcare examples, terminology, and scenarios that would resonate with hospital administrators and medical professionals.
expected_elements: Relevant case studies from healthcare settings

prompts.text: Create a presentation about the same topic (data security) but adapted specifically for the financial services industry. The presentation should address financial regulations (like PCI DSS, SOX), banking security protocols, financial fraud prevention, and industry best practices. Use relevant financial sector examples, terminology, and scenarios that would resonate with banking executives and financial professionals.
expected_elements: Relevant case studies from financial institutions

contextual_adaptation.description: Adaptation of content to industry context
